dcterms:description: The DNS Challenge dataset includes over 500 hours of clean speech clips from 2150 speakers and over 180 hours of noise clips from 150 classes. It provides a publicly available test dataset with synthetic clips, categorized into those without and with reverberations, for evaluating speech enhancement methods.
dcterms:title: DNS Challenge (INTERSPEECH 2020) dataset

dcterms:creator: Elior Hadad
Florian Heese
Peter Vary
Sharon Gannot
dcterms:description: The Multichannel Impulse Response Database contains audio recordings in various acoustic environments, providing impulse responses for different reverberation times to be used in speech processing tasks.
dcterms:title: Multichannel Impulse Response Database

dcterms:creator: Keisuke Kinoshita

dcterms:description: The Reverb Challenge dataset is designed for evaluating speech processing methods in reverberant environments, providing a benchmark for researchers to assess their algorithms against state-of-the-art techniques.
dcterms:title: Reverb Challenge dataset
